channel.title: Overclocking on OzoneOC
channel.description: Recent content in Overclocking on OzoneOC

item.title: Alderlake DDR4 Memory Overclocking
item.description: These notes are for memory overclocking Samsung B-Die on chips such as the 12700K or 12900K; higher end unlocked Alderlake chips with better IMCs. This is not a guide on how to overclock memory, it’s only notes exclusive to Alderlake as it can be trickier than normal. If you want to learn how to OC memory, read the MemTestHelper DDR4 OC Guide by by integralfx. Hardware # CPU # Good CPUs for memory overclocking consist of the 12700K, 12900K, and 12900KS.
